main_title: How a Last-Minute Change Lit Up the World
hook: [excited] Believe it or not, in 1879, Thomas Edison was ready to throw in the towel on the light bulb! But then, a random tweak in his filament material ignited a monumental breakthrough! He swapped out carbon for a new bamboo filament, which lasted over 1,200 hours.
description: A twist of fate turned Edison's near-failure into a groundbreaking invention. #LightBulb #Inventions #History
